description: The chief, homonymous city on the Cycladic island of Kythnos (modern Vriokastro/Episkopi).

properties.description: Representative modern location of the archaeological site based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Αρχαία Κύθνος (Βρυόκαστρο)

history.comment: cleaned up references; added New Pauly reference; summary; added iDAI.gazetteer, Wikipedia, Wikidata, and Trismegistos references provided by bkiesling; added Chronique reference provided by cbouras; added OSM and ToposText locations; added associated modern name
add ToposText reference provided by bkiesling
Location updates and tags from Johan Ahlfeldt's (jahlfeldt) Digital Atlas of the Roman Empire in October 2012
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
New locations, coordinates, and metadata from Harvard's DARMC project. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceUpgradesAndMigrations
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
